post.description: Sends OTP to phone number, verifies it if provided, and returns user data based on registration status

message.example: OTP sent successfully or Authentication successful

post.description: Creates a new user account with profile and preferences

email.description: User's email address (required if phone not provided)

phone.description: User's phone number (required if email not provided)

password.description: User's password (min 8 chars, mixed case, numbers, symbols)

date_of_birth.description: User's date of birth (must be 18+ years old)

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns a token

email.description: User's email address (required if phone not provided)

phone.description: User's phone number (required if email not provided)

post.description: Invalidates the user's authentication token
Sends a one-time password to the provided phone number
Verifies the OTP sent to the phone number and logs in or registers the user

otp.description: One-time password sent to the phone

is_new_user.description: Indicates if the user was just created

post.description: Completes the registration process for users who signed up via OTP

dateOfBirth.description: User's date of birth (must be 18+ years old)

age.description: User's age (calculated from date of birth)

bio.example: I'm an Engineer from NY and I love reading books

422.description: Validation error or registration already completed

post.description: Enables two-factor authentication for the authenticated user
Disables two-factor authentication for the authenticated user
Verifies a two-factor authentication code for the authenticated user

post.summary: Check if an email is already taken
post.description: Checks if the provided email address is already registered in the system
Authenticates user for private broadcasting channels

get.description: Returns all chats for the authenticated user
Returns a specific chat with its messages

message.example: You are not authorized to view this chat

delete.description: Removes the user from the chat (soft delete for the user)

post.description: Sends a new message in a chat

media_file.description: Media file to upload (image, video, audio, or other file)

message_type.description: Type of message (optional, will be auto-detected for uploads)

reply_to_message_id.description: ID of the message being replied to (optional)
ID of the message being replied to (optional)

message.example: You are not authorized to send messages in this chat

post.description: Marks all unread messages in a chat as read

count.description: Number of messages marked as read

message.example: You are not authorized to access this chat

post.description: Creates a new chat with another user or returns existing chat

user_id.description: ID of the user to chat with

get.description: Returns the total number of unread messages across all chats

put.description: Edits a text message (only text messages can be edited)

message.example: Only text messages can be edited
You can only edit your own messages
You can only delete your own messages

post.description: Sends a message with activity tracking and real-time broadcasting

reply_to_message_id.description: ID of message being replied to

post.description: Creates a like from the authenticated user to another user

user_id.description: ID of the user to like

is_match.description: Whether this like created a match

post.description: Creates a dislike from the authenticated user to another user

user_id.description: ID of the user to dislike

get.description: Returns a list of users who liked the authenticated user
Returns a list of users that the authenticated user has liked
Returns a list of potential matches for the authenticated user based on preferences
Returns all matches for the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a match between the authenticated user and another user

user_id.description: ID of the user to match with

delete.description: Deletes a match between the authenticated user and another user

message.example: You are not authorized to delete this match

get.description: Returns stories from users that the authenticated user has matched with

post.description: Creates a new story for the authenticated user

delete.description: Deletes a story belonging to the authenticated user

message.example: You are not authorized to delete this story

post.description: Upload a new photo for the authenticated user

get.description: Get all photos for the authenticated user with optional size parameter

put.description: Update photo order, privacy, and profile photo status

delete.description: Delete a photo for the authenticated user

message.example: You are not authorized to delete this photo
